Facial recognition

For sharing with stakeholders

Partnership on AI: Facial recognition. What do you think of when you hear that term? How do these systems know your name? How accurate are they? And what else can they tell you about someone whose image is in the system?

Gender Shades: How well do IBM, Microsoft, and Face++ AI services guess the gender of a face?
